verbs.name: verbs
verbs.short_desc: All of the verbs supported by the router.

get.name: get
get.short_desc: Register a new GET route with the router.

post.name: post
post.short_desc: Register a new POST route with the router.

put.name: put
put.short_desc: Register a new PUT route with the router.

patch.name: patch
patch.short_desc: Register a new PATCH route with the router.

delete.name: delete
delete.short_desc: Register a new DELETE route with the router.

options.name: options
options.short_desc: Register a new OPTIONS route with the router.

any.name: any
any.short_desc: Register a new route responding to all verbs.

match.name: match
match.short_desc: Register a new route with the given verbs.

controllers.name: controllers
controllers.short_desc: Register an array of controllers with wildcard routing.

controller.name: controller
controller.short_desc: Route a controller to a URI with wildcard routing.

resource.name: resource
resource.short_desc: Route a resource to a controller.

getResourceUri.name: getResourceUri
getResourceUri.short_desc: Get the base resource URI for a given resource.

getResourceWildcard.name: getResourceWildcard
getResourceWildcard.short_desc: Format a resource wildcard for usage.

group.name: group
group.short_desc: Create a route group with shared attributes.

mergeWithLastGroup.name: mergeWithLastGroup
mergeWithLastGroup.short_desc: Merge the given array with the last group stack.

dispatch.name: dispatch
dispatch.short_desc: Dispatch the request to the application.

dispatchToRoute.name: dispatchToRoute
dispatchToRoute.short_desc: Dispatch the request to a route and return the response.

before.name: before
before.short_desc: Register a new "before" filter with the router.

after.name: after
after.short_desc: Register a new "after" filter with the router.

filter.name: filter
filter.short_desc: Register a new filter with the router.

when.name: when
when.short_desc: Register a pattern-based filter with the router.

model.name: model
model.short_desc: Register a model binder for a wildcard.

bind.name: bind
bind.short_desc: Add a new route parameter binder.

pattern.name: pattern
pattern.short_desc: Set a global where pattern on all routes

callRouteBefore.name: callRouteBefore
callRouteBefore.short_desc: Call the given route's before filters.

findPatternFilters.name: findPatternFilters
findPatternFilters.short_desc: Find the patterned filters matching a request.

callRouteAfter.name: callRouteAfter
callRouteAfter.short_desc: Call the given route's before filters.

withoutFilters.name: withoutFilters
withoutFilters.short_desc: Run a callback with filters disable on the router.

enableFilters.name: enableFilters
enableFilters.short_desc: Enable route filtering on the router.

disableFilters.name: disableFilters
disableFilters.short_desc: Disable route filtering on the router.

input.name: input
input.short_desc: Get a route parameter for the current route.

current.name: current
current.short_desc: Get the currently dispatched route instance.

currentRouteNamed.name: currentRouteNamed
currentRouteNamed.short_desc: Determine if the current route matches a given name.

currentRouteUses.name: currentRouteUses
currentRouteUses.short_desc: Determine if the current route action matches a given action.

getCurrentRequest.name: getCurrentRequest
getCurrentRequest.short_desc: Get the request currently being dispatched.

handle.name: handle
handle.short_desc: Get the response for a given request.
